description.en:
A Stardew Valley doujin that follows the love story of Shane and Mugi, a farmer who has just moved to Pelican Town. 
The story is semi-original and does not strictly follow the game's events and dialogue.

title.en: The Demon King's Daughter Is Too Kind!!

altTitles.ja: 魔王の娘は優しすぎる!!

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou no Musume wa Yasashi Sugiru!!

altTitles.pt-br: A filha do Rei Demônio é muito gentil!!

description.en: The strongest Demon King, Ahriman, rules every part of the world. However, he had to stop his world conquest all of a sudden. What is the unexpected reason behind this…?
description.pt-br: O Rei Demônio mais forte, Ahriman, controla cada parte do mundo. Mas, ele precisou parar de conquistar inesperadamente. Qual será a razão inesperada…?

altTitles.ja: ウルトラマン

description.en: (from ebookjapan):Kazuo Umezu's "Ultraman" was serialized at the same time as the 1966 TV broadcast! The fierce battles with popular monsters such as the Baltan and Mefilas aliens are fully recorded along with the color pages from the serialization and the chapter covers!Kazuo Umezu's very famous manga adaptation of the first Ultraman series.

title.en: The Tyrant Wants to Be Good

altTitles.en: The Tyrant Wants to Live Honestly
The Tyrant Wants to Live a Good Life

altTitles.es: La tirana quiere tener una buena vida

altTitles.id: Sang Tiran ingin hidup dengan jujur

altTitles.en: The Tyrant Wants to Live a Virtuous Life

description.en:
Dorothea Milanaire, who was once the tyrant of the Ubera Empire, wound up being hated by the one she loved and was executed. However... after she opened her eyes, she found herself back in her childhood?! Believing this to be her chance, she resolved to live virtuously in this life. Can she repent her past life as a tyrant and live virtuously in her new life...?!

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5469718), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8605301)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9013022), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801736)
description.ko:
폭군님은 갱생 중! 

제국 우베라의 폭군이었던 도로테아 밀라네어. 

눈앞의 모든 것을 제거하며, 빼앗고 탐욕스럽게 먹어 치우는 '악'이었던 그녀는 
결국 사랑하는 사람에게 미움받고 처형을 당하고 만다. 

그런데... 눈을 뜨니 어린 시절로 되돌아왔다?!  

혹시 이건 악과 후회로 얼룩진 인생을 되돌릴 수 있는 기회가 아닐까? 

이번 생의 목표는 착하게 사는 것. 
과연 도로테아는 폭군이었던 과거를 청산하고 새로운 삶에서 착하게 살아갈 수 있을까...?! 

폭군님의 인생을 건 갱생이 시작된다!

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5469718), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8605301)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9013022), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801736)
description.uk:
Доротея Міланір - тиранка імперії Убера, яка була ненависна тому, кого кохала, хоча все своє існування відчайдушно прохала про взаємну любов. Однак... Розплющивши очі, героїня розуміє, що повернулася в дитинство. "Здається, це мій шанс!". Вона ставить собі за мету прожити гідне життя. Чи вдасться їй позбутися своєї минулої тиранічної суті та нарешті жити щасливо?

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5469718), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8605301)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9013022), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801736)

title.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

description.en: 30 popular idols from The Idolmaster Cinderella Girls are gathered on a remote island by a mysterious management. They must survive and fight each other in order to survive and escape from the island.

title.en: Henkyou no Yakushi, Miyako de S Rank Boukensha to naru

altTitles.en: The Healer Ditches the Boonies to Become an S-Rank Adventurer: The Boy from the Hero’s Village Doesn’t Know His Cheat Medicine Is Unrivaled

altTitles.ja: 辺境の薬師、都でＳランク冒険者となる～英雄村の少年がチート薬で無自覚無双～

description.en:
Leaf has been enjoying a peaceful life in his village at the farthest end of the country, but everything gets turned upside down when his fiancée betrays him, robbing him of his home, work, and everything he cherishes. 

Wandering around, lost on what to do next, he encounters a distinguished lady in peril who will change his life forever! Using the cheat-like power of medicine and drugs the world scoffs at, Leaf now begins his journey to become the almighty healer!
description.id: Leaf telah menikmati kehidupan yang damai di desanya di ujung terjauh negara itu, tetapi segalanya menjadi terbalik ketika tunangannya mengkhianatinya, merampok rumah, pekerjaan, dan semua yang dia hargai. Berkeliaran, bingung apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya, dia bertemu dengan seorang wanita terkemuka dalam bahaya yang akan mengubah hidupnya selamanya! Menggunakan kekuatan pengobatan dan obat-obatan yang dicemooh dunia, Leaf kini memulai perjalanannya untuk menjadi penyembuh yang maha kuasa! "
description.ja:
田舎者の少年・リーフが最強の“調薬”スキルで成り上がる！　人生を変える出会いが都会にはいっぱい！！　無自覚無双な痛快“調薬”ファンタジーがここに開幕！！

最強の“調薬”スキルで成り上がれ！！　田舎に住む少年・リーフは、ある日許嫁に裏切られ、すべてを失ってしまう。しかし、大貴族のお嬢様・プリシラと出会ったことでリーフの人生は激変！　「薬を作れるだけなはず」の少年が、世界最強の冒険者になっていく！！

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Yotsuba Keishou-hen

altTitles.es-la: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Sucesión Yotsuba

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - Yotsuba Succession Arc

altTitles.ru: Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Наследник семьи Йоцуба

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 四葉継承編

altTitles.zh: 魔法科高中的劣等生 四叶继承篇

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔法科高中的劣等生 四葉繼承篇

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahō-ka Kōkō no Rettō Nama Yotsuba Keishō-hen

description.en:
In December, Miyuki receives an invitation for the Yotsuba's new year's family gathering. However, unlike previous years, they specially added "Everyone must attend" on the invitation. Miyuki understands that "the time has come" — it is time to decide the next head for the Yotsuba Clan.  
— If she is elected, her brother will be free.  
— If she becomes the next head, she will be forced to marry someone else.  
Miyuki's heart is a mess.  
The truth of the Brother and Sister relationship is finally unveiled!? Yotsuba Keishou-hen begins!  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volume 16.

altTitles.ja: あくまでクジャクの話です。

altTitles.en: It's just a story about peacocks.

description.en:
Kuji Yakurou is a teacher who was cheated on and dumped by his girlfriend because of his "lack of masculinity". Shouldn't the world be gender-free? He is in anguish, and then Akano, a model, influencer, high achiever, and head of the biology department, appears before him and asks him to be the advisor of the biology department. She then begins to explain why "masculinity" is necessary to be popular after all, using the flamboyant feathers of a peacock as an example of "biology"...! 

This is a biological comedy that confronts you with the brutal truth!
description.es-la:
Kuji Yakurou es un profesor que fue engañado y abandonado por su novia debido a su "falta de masculinidad". ¿No debería el mundo estar libre de género? Está angustiado, y luego Akano, una modelo, influencer, triunfadora y jefa del departamento de biología, aparece ante él y le pide que sea el asesor del departamento de biología. Luego comienza a explicar por qué la "masculinidad" es necesaria para ser popular después de todo, ¡usando las extravagantes plumas de un pavo real como ejemplo de "biología"...!

¡Esta es una comedia biológica que te enfrenta a la brutal verdad!

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

title.en: I Only Want to Beat You

altTitles.en: I Want to Beat You, Oh Roji
I Want to Defeat You, Oh Roji

description.en: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
description.uk: Головний герой Лі Ґіґо, який жодного разу в житті не програв, і головна героїня, яка перемогла його, О Роджі. Хто в підсумку стане переможцем в цьому «парі»?
description.es-la: El protagonista masculino que nunca ha sido derrotado en su vida 'gana', la heroína femenina 'solo' que hizo ese guiño pierde por primera vez ¿Quién será el ganador de esta 'apuesta'?

title.en: 30-sai made Doutei de Itara Mahou Shoujo ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 30歳まで童貞でいたら魔法少女になりました

altTitles.en: I Was a Virgin Until I Was 30 so I Was Turned Into a Magical Girl

description.en:
"When you are a virgin until you are 30, you will become a wizard." A famous joke around the Internet… is what I thought, but to think that it actually happened to me!

Wait, but this isn't a wizard? Eh? Magical girl? Why?

Comedy manga about magical girls who used to be old virgin guys!

---

[Alternative Niconico raws](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39350)

title.en: Global Freeze: I Created an Apocalypse Shelter

altTitles.zh: Quan Qiu Bing Feng: Wo Dazaole Mori Anquan Wu

altTitles.en: Freezing The World: I Built A Doomsday Safehouse

altTitles.zh: Quán Qiú Bīng Fēng: Wǒ Dǎzàole Mòrì Ānquán Wū

altTitles.en: The World Is Frozen: I Built a Doomsday Safe House

altTitles.zh: 全球冰封: 我打造了末日安全屋

altTitles.vi: Toàn Cầu Băng Phong: Ta Chế Tạo Phòng An Toàn Tại Tận Thế
Trái Đất Đóng Băng: Tôi Gầy Dựng Nên Phòng An Toàn Thời Tận Thế
Sông Băng Tận Thế, Ta Trữ Hàng Chục Tỷ Vật Tư

description.en:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
description.vi: Toàn cầu tiến vào thời đại băng hà, 95% nhân loại mất mạng! Ở kiếp trước, Trương Dịch lòng dạ lương thiện, nhưng kết quả lại bị người ta lấy ân báo oán. Kiếp này, Trương Dịch trùng sinh trở về, thức tỉnh không gian dị năng, điên cuồng lưu trữ vật tư! Hàn băng tận thế, phân đất vi vương! Thề phải hoàn trả lại quá khứ đau khổ gấp cả trăm lần!
description.pt-br: O mundo mergulhou numa era gelada e 95% da humanidade foi exterminada! Em sua vida anterior, nosso herói Zhang Yi foi tragicamente morto pelas mesmas pessoas que ajudou, graças ao seu bom coração. Mas não tema, pois Zhang Yi renasceu e agora possui o incrível poder de manipulação do espaço! Ele ficou completamente maluco acumulando suprimentos para o apocalipse gelado e está pronto para governar o deserto congelado! Ele promete desencadear cem vezes mais dor naqueles que o prejudicaram no passado!

altTitles.en: There Is No Place for Fakes
No Place for the Fake Princess

altTitles.ja: ニセモノ皇女の居場所はない

description.en:
Philomel—the fake princess—conspires with her mother to impersonate the imperial princess and cause a war between the Mage Tower and the Empire.
Once her crimes were exposed, she was sentenced to execution.
A death truly befitting of a wicked—

“Even if the Philomel within the book had done some wrong, it wasn’t enough to warrant death!”

Philomel yelled and threw the book she'd been reading.
She had simply been curious about a book she'd picked up in the garden, but the contents of the book stated that she would die!
Although she wanted to believe it was nothing but fiction, everything that happened from that moment onwards went just like in the book.

“Since it has come to this… my goal is to survive!”

Will Philomel be able to discover the origins of the suspicious book and live on?

---
After finding a mysterious book in the imperial garden, Princess Philomel not only discovers that the book's villain shares her name, but that other events in the story are coming true too. Now, she believes that she's an imposter and that the real princess will take her rightful place, leading to the execution of Philomel the Fake! So to avoid a tragic death, she has to make sure the rest of the book doesn't come true. Can this fake princess change what's already been written?
description.fr:
Philomel — la fausse princesse — complote avec sa mère pour se faire passer pour la princesse impériale et provoquer une guerre entre la Tour des Mages et l'Empire. Une fois ses crimes exposés, elle est condamnée à l'exécution. Une mort vraiment digne d'une méchante...

‘Même si la Philomel du livre a fait quelque chose de mal, ce n'est pas assez pour justifier la mort!»

Philomel a crié et a jeté le livre qu'elle lisait. Elle avait simplement été curieuse à propos d'un livre qu'elle avait ramassé dans le jardin, mais le contenu du livre disait qu'elle allait mourir! Bien qu'elle ait voulu croire que ce n'était que de la fiction, tout ce qui s'est passé à partir de ce moment-là s'est déroulé comme dans le livre.

«Puisqu'on en est arrivé là... mon but est de survivre!»

Philomel parviendra-t-elle à découvrir les origines du livre suspect et à survivre?
description.id: Setelah bersekongkol dengan ibunya dan memicu perang antara kekaisaran dan menara sihir, Philomel si 'putri palsu' dihukum mati atas semua kejahatannya... Begitulah isi dari buku mencurigakan yang dipungut oleh Philomel di taman. Ia ingin memercayai bahwa cerita di dalam buku itu hanyalah fiksi, tapi semakin hari kejadian di dunia nyata semakin menyerupai buku itu. Agar tidak bernasib sama dengan Philomel yang ada di dalam buku, Philomel memutuskan untuk berusaha bertahan hidup. Akankah hidupnya berjalan sama seperti dengan buku mencurigakan itu?
description.pl:
Philomel - fałszywa księżniczka - spiskowała ze swoją matką, by podszyć się pod cesarską księżniczkę i wywołać wojnę między Wieżą Magów, a Imperium.
Gdy jej zbrodnie zostały ujawnione, została skazana na śmierć.
Konic godny nikczemnika...
"Nawet jeśli Philomel z książki zrobiła coś złego, to nie było to wystarczające, aby uzasadnić wyrok śmierci!"
Philomel krzyknęła i rzuciła książkę, którą czytała.
Była po prostu ciekawa książki, którą znalazła w ogrodzie, ale jej treść mówiła, że umrze!
Choć chciała wierzyć, że to nic innego jak bajka, wszystko, co wydarzyło się od tego momentu, przebiegało dokładnie tak, jak w książce.
"Skoro do tego doszło... moim celem jest przetrwanie!".
Czy Philomel uda się odkryć pochodzenie podejrzanej książki i żyć dalej?
description.pt-br: Philomel, a 'princesa falsa' que conspirou com sua mãe para se passar por princesa imperial, causou uma guerra ao separar a Torre Mágica do Império. Quando ela é considerada culpada de todos os seus crimes, ela é condenada à morte. Realmente digna de uma vilã... "Eu, não, Philomel no livro fiz algo errado, então não é o suficiente para me matar!" Philomel gritou e jogou o livro que estava lendo. Ela estava apenas curiosoa sobre o livro suspeito que pegou no jardim, mas ela, não, a princesa Philomel do livro morreu! Quero acreditar que é apenas uma ficção, mas de alguma forma tudo o que acontece depois se assemelha ao que está escrito no livro. "Agora que está assim... meu único objetivo é sobreviver!" Philomel será capaz de revelar o que aquele livro suspeito diz e reivindicar sua vida?

altTitles.ja: ぷにるはかわいいスライム

description.en: The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!
description.ja: コロコロ史上初、異色のラブコメまんが！！ 自分の作ったスライムが女の子に変身!?　ぷにるの自由気ままな言動に少年・コタローは振り回されっぱなし。毎日愉快なドキドキ生活だ!!

description.en:
Top actress Lee Sia has the ability to see ghosts.
After an accident, she wakes up in the body of 'Camilla Sorfelle'.

But here's the problem.

"Oh, Father, help me!"

This woman's fate always ends in death!

I need to extend my life, so might as well talk to the ghosts first.

Ugh, but why do I keep getting involved with people I want to avoid!?

altTitles.ja: いせかいのめいたんてい

description.en: A story about a dull detective mystery fanatic who, upon dying, gets reincarnated into a different world.

title.en: I Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.ko: 흑막 남편과의 이혼에 실패한 것 같다

altTitles.ko-ro: Heungmang Nampyeongwaui Ihone Silpaehan Geon Gatda

altTitles.en: I Am Afraid I Have Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.fr: Je n'ai pas réussi à divorcer de mon (vilain) mari

altTitles.pt: Falhei em me divorciar do meu esposo

altTitles.ja: 黒幕夫に惚れられました

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the extra character who stalked her husband, the male lead, for 10 years and died. Of course, I tried to divorce him before the female lead appeared.

But, I found out that my young husband was secretly abused in the house. At that moment, I immediately became overwhelmed with the responsibility and sense of duty a modern adult would have. 

**

Aiden had his back turned away from her and suddenly grabbed her arm forcefully. The strength of his hands alone could have ripped her arms off. Erin timidly called his name and spoke. 

"I already reminded you yesterday. We're a married couple, so I'm always on your side." 

"..."

"So, everything is alright." 

She comforted him with these sweet words like it was a spell. And as if he was under her magic, Aiden stopped trembling. 

**

The adult Erin requested to divorce her husband Aiden before the female lead appeared. As soon as those words left her lips, Aiden's smile disappeared. 

"A divorce? Never."

Aiden tore the divorce papers into such thin sheets, the contents were no longer legible. Erin smiled at the sight. (Synopsis source: Gourmet Scans)

---
Ellen's plan is simple. Before turning into an obsessive villain who gets executed, she's going to get a divorce! But after she becomes Ellen Lianster, her plan gets complicated. Her new husband, Aiden, has developed a debilitating fear of being touched, and Ellen is determined to discover the cause and cure. As she finds ways to help him, an affection-deprived Aiden slowly begins to seek comfort from Ellen. With both hearts opening up to each other, can this marriage succeed... at failing?
description.fr: J'ai été réincarnée en tant que la figurante qui a harcelé son mari, le rôle masculin principal, pendant 10 ans et qui est morte. Bien sûr, j'ai essayé de divorcer avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Mais j'ai découvert que la nounou de mon jeune mari abusait secrètement de lui. À ce moment-là, j'ai immédiatement été submergée par la responsabilité et le sens du devoir d'un adulte moderne. *** Aiden, qui lui tournait le dos, lui a soudainement saisi le bras avec force. La seule force de ses mains aurait pu lui arracher les bras. Erin l'appela timidement et prit la parole. «Je te l'ai déjà rappelé hier. Nous sommes un couple marié, alors je suis toujours de ton côté.» «...» «Alors, tout va bien.» Elle le réconforta avec ces mots doux comme s'il s'agissait d'un sortilège. Et comme s'il était sous sa magie, Aiden cessa de trembler. *** Erin, adulte, a demandé le divorce à son mari Aiden avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Dès que ces mots ont quitté ses lèvres, le sourire d'Aiden a disparu. «Un divorce? Jamais.» Aiden a déchiré les papiers du divorce en feuilles si fines que le contenu n'était plus lisible. Erin sourit à cette vue.
description.zh: 漫画简介: 社牛打工人穿成会被疯批男主处死的小恶女，却意外发现10岁的男主是个缺爱小可怜。每天糯叽叽黏人的正太小乖乖，在小恶女的养成下，还会成为腹黑疯批吗？

title.en: A Dog Lives in the Imperial Palace Garden

altTitles.en: A Dog Lives in the Garden of the Imperial Palace

altTitles.es: Un perro vive en el jardín imperial

altTitles.th: เปิดข้อเสนอลับ วิวาห์ร้าย

description.en: The Devon family sits on a mountain of debt and they are on the brink of bankruptcy. This is no fault of hers of course, but Courtney Devon has always been the one painted as the villain in her family. However, the family is in dire straits and they have to do something, anything, to raise some money and get out of this situation. But then one day, news arrives from the Imperial Palace that His Royal Highness the crown prince has decided to make Courtney the crown princess. Seemingly a typical prince on the outside, His Royal Highness is actually quite a troublemaker with a dark side. Will this arrangement end up solving Courtney Devon’s problems or just complicating things further? Will a love against all odds bloom or will someone end up in the doghouse...?
description.id: Keluarga Devon terlilit hutang dan berada di ambang kebangkrutan. Tentu saja ini bukan salahnya, tapi Courtney Devon selalu digambarkan sebagai penjahat di keluarganya. Namun, keluarga tersebut berada dalam kesulitan dan mereka harus melakukan sesuatu, apa saja, untuk mengumpulkan sejumlah uang dan keluar dari situasi ini. Namun suatu hari, datang kabar dari Istana Kekaisaran bahwa Yang Mulia putra mahkota telah memutuskan untuk menjadikan Courtney sebagai putri mahkota. Tampaknya seorang pangeran pada umumnya, Yang Mulia sebenarnya adalah pembuat onar dengan sisi gelap. Apakah pengaturan ini akan menyelesaikan masalah Courtney Devon atau justru semakin memperumit masalah? Akankah cinta melawan segala rintangan berkembang atau akankah seseorang berakhir di rumah anjing...?

altTitles.zh-ro: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang
Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Lu Meihe, the art team leader who is called "Cobra" by her subordinates, is a person with a strict appearance and a pure heart. She has a crush on Lin Wenjing, an intern in the group, but due to her image and personality, she cannot express her friendship naturally, so she can only pin her emotions on the sketchbook she carries with her. In an accident, the secret of the sketchbook was discovered by the person concerned. Only then did Lu Meihe know that Lin Wenjing, who seemed gentle and easy-going, seemed to be not a quiet queen... I was bullied by the junior again today, so happy, what should I do?
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

title.en: Kiraware Majo to Karada ga Irekawatta Keredo, Watashi wa Kyou mo Genki ni Kurashiteimasu!

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ魔女と体が入れ替わったけれど、私は今日も元気に暮らしています！

altTitles.en: I Swapped Bodies With a Wicked Witch, but Today I'll Keep Having Fun!

description.en: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?
description.ja: 取り決めにより雪の国・スニューウから大国・ジルヴァラに輿入れしてきた王女・マリエッタ。しかし魔法が使えないマリエッタは塔に幽閉され、7年後に行われる聖獣召喚の儀式を成功させるため、ひたすら魔法の修行を強いられた。そして7年後見事に白い竜を召喚したマリエッタだが、次の瞬間謎の声にいざなわれ、気がつけば見知らぬ場所にいた。しかも見た目はそっくりなのに、どんな魔法も使えるほど魔力に溢れた身体になっていて…。

altTitles.ja: 夜明けにふる

description.en: This story takes place a few years after Hoshino and Sudou have settled down together. Sudou's son Shouta is in high school now and so is his former classmate Daiki from elementary school. How has their relationship changed?

He stood at the pinnacle of the world. Surpassing all since birth in the art of the sword. But fate has left him crippled moments before reaching the apex. But the story continues and the legend will rise again…

---
- **Note:** 2nd Place in 15th Chinese Golden Dragon Manhua Awards
description.fr: Il se tenait au sommet du monde. Surpassant tout depuis la naissance dans l'art de l'épée. Mais le destin l'a laissé infirme quelques instants avant d'atteindre le sommet. Mais l'histoire continue et la légende renaîtra…
description.zh: 天下最风流的剑客，名曰沈三公子。 天下最有名的剑法，唤作万藏剑经。 天下最强大最神秘的地方，是为弃剑山庄。 每周六早上九点准时更新~

altTitles.th: เลเวลอัปไปกับเทพเจ้า

altTitles.ja: 神と共にレベルアップ

description.en:
“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

異界の神、アウターゴッドと呼ばれる存在が支配する世界。一番最後に塔へ入り一番最後までインナーゴッドたちと共に戦った人間、神野 流星。 そんな彼も結局はアウターゴッドに破れてしまう。 越えられない壁に絶望を感じていた最後の瞬間、時間を司る神であるクロノスから新たにチャンスが与えられる。 そうして彼は、前世の記憶を持ったまま過去へ回帰することに――。 再び塔を登り、力と仲間を手に入れた神野は、今度こそアウターゴッドに勝つことができるだろうか？不滅の神話に挑む人間の物語が今始まる！

description.ko:
이계의 신, 아우터 갓(Outer God).

하늘을 닫는 절망과 늪에 빠진 좌절, 탄생하지 못한 자, 어리석은 혼돈.
평범한 사람들은 그저 바라보는 것만으로 목숨을 잃어 버릴 그 존재들이 세상을 휘젓는 지금…
수 년간의 싸움 끝에, 최후의 생존자들이 낸 결론.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다."

그 순간, 시간을 다루는 신격을 지닌 존재 크로노스는 자신을 희생시켜 시계태엽을 되돌린다.

"이길 수 없겠지. 지금은 말이야."

"옛 세계선으로 돌아가라. 그리고 다시 시작해."

모든 신들에게 지목을 받아 과거로 돌아간 최후의 1인.
가장 뒤늦게 탑을 올라, 가장 마지막까지 신들과 함께 싸운 인간, 김유원.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다. 그렇다면…"

"이기는 건 나야."

그는 마지막 순간을 함께하던 동료들을 다시 모아,
아우터와의 싸움을 승리로 끝낼 수 있을까?

Он был храбрейшим и сильнейшим из всех, но даже его в самом конце ожидало лишь отчаяние. В последние мгновения ему был дан еще один шанс. Благодаря жертве бога времени «Хроноса» его судьба еще не была предрешена. "อินเนอร์อย่างพวกเราไม่สามารถเอาชนะเอาเตอร์ได้"

เมื่อแรงเกอร์ในหอคอยลงความเห็นเป็นเสียงเดียวกัน
'คิมยูวอน' มนุษย์ผู้แกร่งกล้าเพียงหนึ่งเดียวในหมู่เทพเจ้า

และแกร่งขึ้นกว่าเดิมจนกลับไปเอาชนะ 'เอาเตอร์ก็อด'

外界之神来袭，人间陷入了排山倒海般的绝望之中，生灵涂炭……而当内界众神在经过了数年的苦苦战斗后，也最终以战败收场。 在战死前的最后时刻，希腊神克洛诺斯牺牲了自己，重新开启了时间之门。 而众神最后选择了金幽元，这个队伍中唯一的人类，让他回到过去，重新将众神凝聚。

altTitles.ja: 勇者が帰ってきた

altTitles.th: สงครามนักรบผู้หวนคืน

description.en:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
description.fr:
Après avoir sauvé un monde, le héros Minsu Kim revient sur Terre et découvre qu'il a tout perdu. Il décide donc de détruire le monde qu'il avait l'habitude d'appeler ‘chez lui’. Dans son saccage, il tue le héros Jeongsu Park, mais au lieu de mourir normalement, Jeongsu est transporté dans un autre monde. Après avoir tué le roi démon de ce monde alternatif et grandi en tant que héros, Jeongsu revient sur terre, déterminé à se venger de Minsu. Alors que les deux héros se battent avec le destin de leur pays en jeu, qui sortira vainqueur?

description.en:
When civil engineering student Suho Kim falls asleep reading a fantasy novel, he wakes up as a character in the book.

 Suho is now in the body of Lloyd Frontera, a lazy noble who loves to drink, and whose family is in a mountain of debt. Using his engineering knowledge, Suho designs inventions to avert the terrible future that lies in wait for him. 

With the help of a giant hamster, a knight, and the world’s magic, can Suho dig his new family out of debt and build a better future?
description.ja:
大自然の中でのスローライフもよし、最高の教育機関で学ぶのもよし！交通の便はもちろんのこと、赤ちゃんからご老人までどの世代の方にもご満足いただけるワンストッププレミアムライフをフロンテラ男爵領がご提案いたします！現在、先着順にて分譲契約中！

소설 속 귀족이 된 토목공학도 김수호. 
그런데 뭐? 내 영지가 곧 망할 거라고? 
그럼 살려야지. 설계하고, 건설하고, 분양해서. 

【전 대륙이 기다려온 특별한 기회! 퍼펙트한 교통, 최상의 학군, 쾌적한 숲세권, 원스톱 프리미엄 영지 라이프의 프론테라 남작령이 여러분을 기다립니다. 선착순 분양계약중!】

穿越到小说成了废物贵族！
逆天改命构建商业帝国！
土木设计工程学专业的金修豪意外穿越到小说里，还成为了一个在初期就会死掉的废物贵族。已经看到小说结局的修豪知道自家的领地快玩儿完了！那得赶紧救活它啊！设计，建设，出售啊！

description.es-la: Kim Suho, que es ingeniero civil, se convirtió en un noble dentro de una novela. ¿Y qué? ¿Mi patrimonio está a punto de fracasar? Entonces debe salvarse. Diseñar, construir y vender. [¡La esperada oportunidad especial en todo el continente! El transporte perfecto, el distrito educativo más alto, un área forestal agradable y una vida familiar de primera calidad en Baron Frontera que todos han estado esperando. ¡Un contrato por orden de llegada!

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: My Harem Consists Entirely of Female Demon Villains

altTitles.zh: 我的后宫全是反派魔女

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Hougong Quan Shi Fanpai Monü

description.en: I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!

altTitles.ja: ダーウィンズゲーム

altTitles.th: ดาร์วินส์ เกม

description.en:
High school student Kaname Sudou receives an invitation from a classmate to play Darwin’s Game, a mobile game he has never heard of. However, as soon as he opens the application, a green snake suddenly pops out from his phone screen and bites his neck, leaving him unconscious. Waking up in the infirmary without any signs of a snake bite, he is told by the school to take the rest of the day off. Although he is puzzled by what has happened, he dismisses the surreal experience as a hallucination and boards the train home.  
Unfortunately, his curiosity gets the better of him and he uses the application once again. As the application appears to be just like any other battle game, Kaname breathes out a sigh of relief and decides to start his first match. However, the pleasant surprise is short-lived, as his in-game opponent unexpectedly appears right in front of him and attempts to hunt him down with a knife.  
As he desperately runs for his life, Kaname puts two and two together and realizes that Darwin’s Game is not an ordinary game, but rather, it’s a brutal fight for survival.
description.vi: Học sinh trung học Kaname Sudou nhận được lời mời từ một người bạn cùng lớp để chơi Trò chơi của Darwin, một trò chơi di động mà cậu chưa bao giờ nghe nói đến. Tuy nhiên, khi vừa mở ứng dụng, một con rắn lục bất ngờ chui ra từ màn hình điện thoại và cắn vào cổ khiến anh bất tỉnh. Tỉnh dậy trong bệnh xá mà không có biểu hiện gì của rắn cắn, anh được nhà trường thông báo cho nghỉ hết ngày. Mặc dù bối rối trước những gì đã xảy ra, anh ta gạt bỏ trải nghiệm siêu thực như một ảo giác và lên tàu về nhà.Thật không may, sự tò mò của anh ấy càng tốt hơn và anh ấy sử dụng ứng dụng một lần nữa. Khi ứng dụng trông giống như bất kỳ trò chơi chiến đấu nào khác, Kaname thở phào nhẹ nhõm và quyết định bắt đầu trận đấu đầu tiên của mình. Tuy nhiên, điều bất ngờ thú vị chỉ tồn tại trong thời gian ngắn, khi đối thủ trong trò chơi của anh ta bất ngờ xuất hiện ngay trước mặt anh ta và cố gắng săn lùng anh ta bằng một con dao.Khi anh ta tuyệt vọng chạy cho cuộc sống của mình, Kaname đặt hai và hai lại với nhau và nhận ra rằng Trò chơi của Darwin không phải là một trò chơi bình thường, mà đúng hơn, đó là một cuộc chiến tàn khốc để sinh tồn

altTitles.ja: 他校のボーイッシュ彼女

altTitles.en: I’m Trapped In A Terrible Drama

description.en:
The main character, who grew up as an orphan, finally achieves her dream of owning her own home after suffering.
Her joy was short-lived and she suddenly died while watching a drama she enjoyed, feeling pain in her chest. However, when she opened her eyes again, she was in a drama she had watched before she died! And that too, while possessing Shin Sera, a villain who tries to kill the female protagonist, but is destroyed by the male protagonists!

Shin Sera Loving's main character tries to escape from the drama to prevent her destruction, but there is a succession rival who hates her, a fiancé who doesn't even treat her as a human being, and a pervert with a blank face.... With a variety of male protagonists with outbursts of personality, are you getting more and more entangled?
description.fr: Le personnage principal, qui a grandi en tant qu'orpheline, réalise enfin son rêve d'avoir sa propre maison après de longues épreuves. Cependant, sa joie est de courte durée : alors qu'elle regarde sa série préférée, elle ressent une douleur dans la poitrine et meurt soudainement. Lorsqu'elle rouvre les yeux, elle découvre qu'elle se trouve à l'intérieur du feuilleton qu'elle regardait avant de mourir ! Pire encore, elle s'est réincarnée en Shin Sera, une méchante qui tente de tuer le personnage principal féminin et qui est finalement tuée par le personnage principal masculin !

altTitles.ja: きみは、ニーナじゃない
きみは ニーナじゃない

description.en: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!
description.pt-br: Aoba é um jovem que sofreu um trauma devido a um terrível término de relacionamento. Por conta disso, desenvolveu medo de interagir com outras pessoas, deixou seu emprego e passou a viver fazendo trabalhos temporários, tendo como única alegria assistir às transmissões de sua streamer favorita. Certo dia, ao ser abordado por uma garota que costumava ver em seu caminho de volta para casa, ele acaba concordando em morar com ela? Ele fica surpreso ao descobrir que ela era justamente sua streamer favorita... Assim, tem início um romance transformador entre um rapaz de coração partido e uma streamer!

title.en: Maydare Tensei Monogatari: Kono Sekai de Ichiban Warui Majo

altTitles.ja: メイデーア転生物語
メイデーア転生物語 この世界で一番悪い魔女

altTitles.en: Tales of Reincarnation in Maydare: The World's Worst Witch

altTitles.de: Wiedergeburt in Maydare: Die bösartigste Hexe der Welt

altTitles.fr: Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré
Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré: La pire sorcière en le monde

description.de: Einst rettete Makia, die Tochter einer berüchtigten Hexe, dem Sklavenjungen Thor das Leben. Gemeinsam wuchsen sie auf und erlernten magische Fähigkeiten. Doch dann reißt das Schicksal sie auseinander und Makia landet an einer Magierakademie, wo sie sich schwört, die beste Schülerin ihres Jahrgangs zu werden, um ihren alten Freund möglichst schnell wiederzufinden. Denn es gibt noch ein weiteres Geheimnis, das sie verbindet: Beide kamen ursprünglich aus einer anderen Welt nach Maydare! Dort war Makia eine gewöhnliche, japanische Oberschülerin, die gemeinsam mit zwei anderen Klassenkameraden umgebracht wurde. Wird es ihr gelingen, das Verbrechen aufzuklären und in der neuen Welt ihr Glück zu finden?
description.en:
Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School!  


---
description.fr: Makia est une noble dame issue d'une infâme sorcière. Thor, un garçon qui a été élevé avec elle et est venu d'un autre monde, est choisi pour être le chevalier du «sauveur». Les deux sont forcés de se séparer, et pour revoir Thor, Makia vise à être la meilleure élève de Magic School!
description.id: Makia adalah seorang gadis bangsawan yang merupakan keturunan dari seorang penyihir yang dikenal akan kejahatannya. Thor, seorang anak laki-laki yang dirawat bersama makia dan datang dari dunia lain, dipilih untuk menjadi seorang ksatria bagi sang "penyelamat". Keduanya terpaksa harus berpisah karena suatu alasan, dan ketika mereka berdua dipertemukan kembali, Makia bertekad untuk menjadi murid terbaik yang ada di sekolah sihir! ---
description.ru: Загадочный мир под названием «Мейдер». В нём существуют магия, рыцари, драконы и… ведьмы. Макия – юная волшебница из дворянской семьи, являющаяся потомком «Самой худшей ведьмы этого мира», и любительница провести вечерок-другой, изучая новые заклинания. Однажды она встречает необычного паренька, которому даёт имя Тор. Вместе они продолжают углубляться в исследование колдовства и довольно быстро находят общий язык. Это начало длинной истории о девочке, пытающейся понять себя и свои истинные чувства.
description.tr: Makia, kötü şöhretli bir cadının soyundan gelen asil bir hanımefendi. Başka bir dünyadan gelen ve Makia ile birlikte büyüyen Thor, "Kurtarıcı"nın şövalyesi olarak seçiliyor. İkisi de birbirlerinden ayrılmak zorunda kalıyorlar ve Makia, Thor'u bir kez daha görmek için Büyü Okulu'nun en iyi öğrencisi olmayı hedefliyor!

title.en: Everyday Life with a Succubus Slave (Fan Colored)

altTitles.ja: サキュバス奴隷との日常
ちるらん 新撰組鎮魂歌【レクイエム】

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
description.pt-br: Em 1912, uma jovem mulher rastreia o idoso Nagakura Shinpachi, determinada a ouvir a verdadeira história do Demônio do Shinsengumi, o Vice-Comandante Hijikata Toshizou. A história de Hijikata começa em 1859, quando ele é um jovem violento que está aprimorando suas habilidades com a espada enquanto vende os remédios de sua família. Logo, em sua busca para encontrar pessoas mais fortes para lutar, Hijikata começa a entrar em contato com outros que eventualmente se tornarão seus companheiros no Shinsengumi. O primeiro a causar uma impressão no jovem impetuoso é Kondo Isami, que prova ser um lutador melhor do que Hijikata.

altTitles.ja: 逆行した悪役令嬢は、なぜか魔力を失ったので深窓の令嬢になります

Somehow, the Villainess Who Regressed in Time Lost Her Magic Power, so She Turned Into a Secluded Maiden

altTitles.zh: 逆行的恶役大小姐、在不知为何失去了魔力之后变成了深闺大小姐

description.en:
Rachel was chosen as the Crown Prince’s fiancée solely by virtue of the immense magical powers she possessed. Thus, when the Saint appeared, she feared that her most coveted position would get snatched away from her.

Spurred by jealousy, Rachel committed evil deeds against the Saint, resulting in her engagement getting broken. As further punishment, she was sent away to a monastery, but her carriage was attacked by bandits *en route*. Just when she thought that death was imminent, she woke up with a start… only to find herself three years in the past — with almost all of her magic gone, and her body so frail and weak that she could barely even leave her bed!

Determined to prevent fate from repeating itself, Rachel resolved to take full advantage of this second chance and call off her engagement pronto. But for some reason, the Crown Prince keeps refusing to break things off with her—?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9460fv/)
description.id:
Rachel dipilih sebagai tunangan putra mahkota hanya karena kekuatan sihir besar yang dimilikinya, Lalu, ketika sang santa muncul, dia takut kalau posisinya sebagai tunangan akan direbut darinya. 
Akhirnya, karena terbakar api cemburu, Rachel melakukan tindakan jahat kepada sang santa yang mengakibatkan tunangannya dibatalkan.
Kemudian setelah itu dia dihukum dengan dikirim ke kuil terpencil, tapi pada saat perjalanan, kendaraannya diserang oleh sekawanan bandit. 
Sesaat dia berpikir kalau kematiannya tidak akan bisa dihindari, dia ternyata telah terbangun dari tidurnya dan menyadari kalau dirinya telah kembali 3 tahun lalu bersamaan dengan menghilangnya kekuatan sihirnya.
Karena diberi kesempatan untuk mengulangi kembali kehidupannya, Rachel memutuskan memanfaatkan kesempatan ini untuk segera membatalkan pertunangannya sendiri.
Akan tetapi tidak disangka-sangka, sang putra mahkota malah menolak pembatalan pertunangannya, kira-kira kenapa ya?
description.ja:
魔力の高さから王太子の婚約者となるも、聖女の出現によりその座を奪われることを恐れたラシェル。
聖女に悪逆非道な行いをしたことで婚約破棄されて修道院送りとなり、
修道院へ向かう道中で賊に襲われて殺されてしまう。

死んだと思ったラシェルが目覚めると、なぜか3年前に戻っていたが
ほとんどの魔力を失い、ベッドから起き上がれないほどの病弱な体になってしまった。

今度は周りの人も自分も幸せな未来をつかむため、
これ幸いと今度はこちらから王太子との婚約を破棄しようとするが、
なぜか王太子が婚約破棄を拒否してきて!?
しかも魔力を失ったと思っていたのに、世界初の闇の精霊が私のもとへ!?

悪役令嬢が精霊と共に未来を変える異世界ハッピーファンタジー！
電子限定描き下ろし特典付き！

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9460fv/)

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

altTitles.es-la: La luna en una noche lluviosa

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her. [Kodansha]
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.

altTitles.en: クロノス 次世代犯罪情報室

description.en:
The National Police Agency Security Bureau has a secret organization known as the Next Generation Crime Information Center. Their job is to stop the murders by using a certain girl’s precognitive “dreams” before they actually happen! Written by the same author as Shinrei Tantei Yakumo.  
  
Adapted from a novel.

altTitles.en: I'll be Taking Over this Duchy
I'll Take the Dukedom From Today

altTitles.es-la: Tomaré el Ducado a Partir de Hoy

description.en:
"I was a noble this whole time?!"

Hilde, a commoner who works at a restaurant in the village, is suddenly notified by a handsome man named Logan that she is a family member of one of the empire's four duchies and hears that her mother 'Lucia Arpeggio' was a powerful mage in the past.

Duke Arpeggio offers to make her an official member of the family if she can prove that she has strong magical powers, and Hilde accepts in order to escape from her oppressed commoner livelihood and enjoy a comfortable life.

However, her excitement doesn't last long… Culture, magic, history, literature, etc. The number of things nobles needed to learn were endless! In addition, forget about welcoming Hilde, her family members only sent her cold looks and even put her life in danger…

"You've left me with no choice. I, a former commoner, will be taking over this duchy!"
description.pt-br:
"Eu era uma nobre esse tempo todo?!"

Hilde, uma plebeia que trabalha em um restaurante na vila, é repentinamente notificada por um homem bonito chamado Logan de que ela é membro da família de um dos quatro ducados do império e ouve que sua mãe 'Lucia Arpeggio' era uma poderosa maga no passado.

O Duque Arpeggio ofereceu torná-la um membro oficial da família se ela puder provar que tem fortes poderes mágicos, e Hilde aceita para escapar de seu sustento oprimido e desfrutar de uma vida confortável.

No entanto, sua empolgação não dura muito... Cultura, magia, história, literatura, etc. O número de coisas que os nobres precisavam aprender era infinito! Além disso, esqueça a recepção de Hilde, seus familiares apenas lhe lançaram olhares frios e até colocaram sua vida em perigo…

"Vocês não me deram escolha. Eu, uma ex-plebeia, assumirei este ducado!"

description.en: Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.ja: 聖戦記エルナサーガ

description.en: A war-torn world. The prince of Ansaz, Þjálfi the Immortal, continued his march with the strength of a demon god. The country he was aiming for was Arsatual. The princess, Elna, is incapable of using magic. But because of this, she is said to be able to use the sacred sword...
description.vi: Cuộc phiêu lưu của Công chúa Elna từ vương quốc Arthurtual và Hoàng tử Thjalfi từ vương quốc đối địch Ansuz. Tình yêu, phiêu lưu và chiến tranh, một bộ truyện mang đậm phong cách Gibili rất hay mà bạn không nên bỏ qua.
